attributes.action:
Eradicate the insulting term “BAME”
It alienates
Acknowledge us separately
attributes.additional_details: We are NOT the same, we shouldn’t  need to explain this in 2020
attributes.background:
Eradicate the insulting term “BAME”

The term “BAME” alienates us from the wider community.

Our unique differences, religious practices culture structures and  inequalities need to be acknowledged separately and not encaged.  

We are not the same! This is the year 2020 not 1764

rejection.details:
The Government is not responsible for determining how ethnic minorities are referred to.

The Government's guidance on writing about ethnicity already states that it does not use BAME or BME for a number of reasons: https://www.ethnicity-facts-figures.service.gov.uk/style-guide/writing-about-ethnicity
